page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: The main religion in our block is Church of England, although there are some Quakers. There are two churches, one in Lewknor which is called St.Margaret's and one in Pyrton. There is also a private one belonging to Shirburn Castle. The vicar of Lewknor church, Mr.Jefferyes, has to look after five other Parishes (North of our area) as well. He takes groups in school as our school is Church of England Controlled. Both churches are built of local flint with stone dressings. St.Margaret's has foundations which date back to the Norman times (1146).
